On Fri, 13 Jan 2006, Ridvan Bedekar <ridvanh_bedekar@...>
wrote:

>       <test name="${testcase}" if="testcase"/>

says run the tests in class named ${testcase} if that property is set.

> where
> testcase=D:\\code\\TokensServerLibrary\\src\\javatest\\com\\rbsg\\tokens\\server\\common\\test\\AllServerLibraryTests

Sets testcase to something that is no classname.  I guess you mean

,----
| testcase=com.rbsg.tokens.server.common.test.AllServerLibraryTests
`----

instead.

Stefan
